short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UPROI is a tool to instantly calculate the ROI of NFT investments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UPROI is a tool to instantly calculate the ROI of NFT investments.

It allows users to see the price of NFT at the time of purchase, the amount of gas spent, the royalties charged by the project, the 2.5% fee charged by OPENSEA, and the gas fee now required to sell, both on their own profile page and when they sell.
*The data is provided by NFTbank.
